entries.journal_entry_description: Having survived the battle outside the Avatar Platform, Broodmaster Hss'kas crashed landed in Etyyy. Find his escape pod, and kill Hss'kas.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Scanners showed that Hss'kas's escape pod came down somewhere in the eastern hunting grounds.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: We have a more exact fix on his location. Deep in the eastern part of Etyyy you will find some dense forest where the webweavers make their home. His pod will be somewhere in that region. Be careful, the native webweaver will not approve of your presence.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The location where you can find Hss'kas has been narrowed. Travel to the Venemous Glade and confront him.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: You are a fool if you think to defeat me so easily. Let us see how strong you are without your ship. Take a look at these deep woods, their memory will have to endure you in your trip to whatever afterlife awaits.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Hss'kas is not surprised by your approach and is waiting for you deeper into the Glade.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: These local creatures are wonderfuly weak minded. Perhaps you would enjoy their company as well as I have.
entries.task08_comm_message_text: You just don't know when to die do you? Well then let me teach you what it means to face one of the Blackscale!
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Now that the Broodmaster is defeated, return quickly to Gursan Bryes.
